txt.en: Thane Mágla's home can be found directly to the south-east of the Mead Hall in Middlemead.\n\nThane Mágla has asked that you gather keepsakes from his bedside and return them to him, so his council might gather once last time.
Empty chairs can be found in the rear of the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou have gathered the keepsakes of Thane Mágla's councilmen. You should continue to place them at Mágla's side.
Placed the horseshoe
Empty chairs can be found in the rear of the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou have gathered the keepsakes of Thane Mágla's councilmen. You should now return them to Mágla's side.
Place the shield at Mágla's side
Empty chairs can be found in the rear of the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou have gathered the keepsakes of Thane Mágla's councilmen. You should continue to place them at Mágla's side.
Placed the shield
Place the sword at Mágla's side
Empty chairs can be found in the rear of the Mead Hall of Middlemead.\n\nYou have gathered the keepsakes of Thane Mágla's councilmen. You should continue to place them at Mágla's side.
Placed the sword
Place the horn at Mágla's side
Talk to Thane Mágla
Placed the horn

'Thank you, [placeholder]...

'My council has again rallied at my command, but for all your effort, they have nothing left to say.'

Mágla's eyes glaze over as he glances fruitlessly to the chairs at his side.
Collected keepsakes of Mágla's councilmen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Heartbroken to learn the last of his council was slain, Thane Mágla wishes to sit amongst his men once more before the war's end.
'Have you gathered the keepsakes of my men?'
Collect keepsakes of Mágla's councilmen ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'My council... is gone. Each of them has fallen to disease or blade, and now none remain to dissuade me from the truth.

'This war is over, [placeholder], even though others cannot see this. We merely delay our deaths, and no matter where we choose to hide, the White Hand will find us.

'My men would sit amongst me here as we talked of strategy and glory... Bah! What glory is there now?

'If you would, travel to my home. I have left keepsakes from each of my men at my bedside. Bring them here, and they can join Egbalth's horn at my side one last time.'
Thane Mágla can be found in the Mead Hall of Middlemead.
Empty Chairs
Place the horseshoe at Mágla's side
